about_the_game:
Positioning & Messaging:

Liberta: Rise of Freedom is an action RPG game in first-person view that incorporates mechanics from the rogue-lite genre. Customise your character build, strategize how to overcome enemies, and embark on an adventure filled with unique choices and challenges. Each time you play, the game's artificial intelligence-supported NPC characters offer a unique progression experience. In Liberta: Rise of Freedom, you can create a character and choose to play as one of several classes, including an agile warrior who wields two swords, a knight who wears heavy armour and wields a double-edged longsword, a wizard who uses fire spells to turn enemies into ashes, or a witch who freezes and kills her enemies. Join the ranks of Lux Libertatis and fight to save Bleakmoore!

Attractive Points

  • Detailed and Immersive Fantastic Universe: Immerse yourself in the essence of the story and this fantastical universe.



  • Active Dual-Wield Combat System: Utilize your weapons and spells in various combinations, whether wielding two swords as a warrior, casting different spells with both hands as a wizard, or playing a hybrid combination of both. But remember, they're learning.



  • Unique Dash & Dodge Mechanics: Utilize dash and dodge mechanics to evade enemy attacks or play more aggressively. It's essential to manage your energy wisely.



  • Environmental Mechanics: Use different ways to overcome enemies by engaging with environmental mechanics. Gain an advantage through environmental Interactions.



  • AI supported NPC's & Unique Gameplay Experience: Enemies also learn from you through AI-supported NPCs. Experience the effects of your previous choices each time you begin this adventure, crafting a unique gameplay experience.



  • Impressive Graphics: Enhance the gaming experience with stunning particle effects and enjoy the beauty of unique landscapes.



  • Unique Boss System: The Apex Alliance army does not kill the Hunters, but steals their free spirit and adds them to their own ranks. The player must play knowing that they will fight with their previous character in the next playthrough!

Story

Bleakmoore Village has been under the oppressive rule of an ancient race known as the Apex Alliance for centuries. Their private army of powerful generals has forced the village's young people to work in the dangerous Bleakmoore mines, extracting resources for the Alliance's insatiable thirst for power.
But a new hope has emerged: the Lux Libertatis, a revolutionary organisation committed to overthrowing the Apex Alliance and freeing Bleakmoore from their grasp. As a member of the Lux Libertatis, it's up to you to infiltrate the Alliance's stronghold, the Obsidian Castle, and take down their five most powerful generals. But the task won't be easy. Each raid on the castle can only be led by a single hunter from the Lux Libertatis, and if they fail to take down all five generals and clear all five floors of the castle, their free spirit is stolen by the Alliance's forces and they become enslaved to their will. You'll need to use all your skills, strategy, and cunning to take on the Apex Alliance's powerful generals. Regina and Rex, the water-wielding siblings who guard the first floor. Stellasolis, the light-wielding defender of the second floor. Impesignis, the fiery guardian of the third floor. Lignavir, the powerful second-in-command wielding a giant axe on the fourth floor. And finally, General Pax, the master of illusion and darkness who guards the fifth and final floor. Only the most skilled hunters will be able to defeat one of the five generals and earn the title of "Highborn Hunter". And if you can defeat them all and liberate Bleakmoore from the Apex Alliance's rule, you'll earn the title of "Father of Liberty". With challenging gameplay, a rich and immersive story, and intense battles against powerful enemies, "Liberta:Rise of Freedom" is a must-play for fans of fantasy, roguelike, and indie games alike. Will you rise to the challenge and free Bleakmoore from the Alliance's hold?

content_descriptors.notes: The game features adult content, including violence and blood, which may not be suitable for all players. It is recommended for mature audiences only.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10-64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-8100 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1060 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 39 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11-64 Bit or Windows 10-64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K @ 3.60GHz or AMD Ryzen 7 2700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD 5700 / NVIDIA RTX 2080 / Intel ARC / 8 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 39 GB available space

short_description: Deep into the dungeons of Bleakmoore , you'll face hordes of enemies in each room , you'll build a unique character each time you die, play with different skills, weapons, and items. Level up as you collect loot to become even more powerful. Fans of FPS action-RPG gameplay will love Liberta
